nodes.description: 自杀式爆炸袭击发生在Data Darbar shrine外的精英警察部队车辆附近
nodes.support_text: The blast, which targeted a police van stationed outside the entrance of Data Darbar, claimed the lives of five police officials...

nodes.description: 爆炸导致5名警察、1名保安和多名平民死亡
nodes.support_text: claimed the lives of five police officials, a security guard and civilians.

nodes.description: 医院报告26名伤者正在接受治疗，其中2人情况危急
nodes.support_text: Around 26 others were being treated for their injuries, two of whom were in critical condition, the official added.

nodes.description: 新增1名警察Saddam Hussain因伤去世，总死亡人数升至11人
nodes.support_text: as another police official succumbed to his injuries earlier today.

nodes.description: 确认4名牺牲警察身份为Head Constable Shahid Nazir等
nodes.support_text: The other four martyred police officers were identified as Head Constable Shahid Nazir, Head Constable Muhammad Sohail, Head Constable Gulzar Ahmad, and Constable Muhammad Saleem.

nodes.description: 披露自杀袭击者为15岁男孩，在爆炸中自毁
nodes.support_text: According to Shahbaz Gill, spokesperson for chief minister of Punjab, the suicide bomber was a 15-year-old boy who blew himself up near the Elite Force police van stationed outside the 11th century shrine.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致警察官员受伤
nodes.support_text: 警察官员在爆炸中受伤

edges.support_text: claimed the lives of five police officials, a security guard and civilians.

According to Shahbaz Gill, spokesperson for chief minister of Punjab, the suicide bomber was a 15-year-old boy who blew himself up near the Elite Force police van stationed outside the 11th century shrine.
爆炸导致5名警察、1名保安和多名平民死亡
as another police official succumbed to his injuries earlier today.
The other four martyred police officers were identified as Head Constable Shahid Nazir, Head Constable Muhammad Sohail, Head Constable Gulzar Ahmad, and Constable Muhammad Saleem.
Around 26 others were being treated for their injuries, two of whom were in critical condition, the official added.
